data.eml:eml: A revision of Pseudoparonella, Plumachaetas, Parachaetoceras and Lawrenceana (Collembola: Paronellidae), with description of three new species from New Caledonia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhang, Feng, Deharveng, Louis (2015): A revision of Pseudoparonella, Plumachaetas, Parachaetoceras and Lawrenceana (Collembola: Paronellidae), with description of three new species from New Caledonia. Zootaxa 4058 (4): 561-577, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4058.4.7
